actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Social Security.

official_title: To amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide for a gradual increase by the year 2030 in the normal retirement age and the early retirement age to ages 70 and 67, respectively.
short_title: Social Security Retirement Age Reform Act of 1993
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Social Security Retirement Age Reform Act of 1993 - Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) (OASDI) of the Social Security Act to phase in an increase in the age for normal and early retirement to, respectively, ages 70 and 67.

titles.title: Social Security Retirement Age Reform Act of 1993
To amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide for a gradual increase by the year 2030 in the normal retirement age and the early retirement age to ages 70 and 67, respectively.
